::Slayer/Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Smokescreen::

Slayer nods, turning around to fire two rockets at Ramulus (Cyberwolf 
posted for four rockets, so I guess they were already counted). He 
flies up near Prebon.

"I think I killed the femm that was with them," he says, frowning 
about the thought of Spears coming back, "There are much better 
warriors than Spears, Master. We could recruit them instead.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A rocket hits Ramulus in the leg, nearly blasting it into
smitherenes. 
He growls unconscioustly, his spark releasing repair coils and 
beginning to work on the damage.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm nods. "I'll take him," he says, walking over to BlueStreak
and 
lifting him to his shoulder.

"Meet you all back at the Ark," he says, flying off.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Proto walks over to SnowCat, kneeling to check on her damage. She was 
dead.

"She's dead," he says, standing up, "Do we take her back to the Ark."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smokescreen reaches the Ark, entering and putting Spears in a CR 
chamber.

He sighs as he sits back and waits for her to heal, relaxing for a 
short while.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon smiled evily.
> 
> "Than let's make sure that he's dead. Fire two rockets at him. I 
will 
> do the same."
> 
> Prebon fired two missles at Ramulus and than continued flying away.
> 
> "And I got the Ninja bot with a chip. It's not going to make him
one 
> of us, but it's in his spark. It will make him go mad with anger
and 
> things, maybe attack the Maximals. It'll be great. And don't think 
> that we are done with the Maximals yet. We have not forgotten 
Spears, 
> and we will get her back."
> 
> He continued back to the base.
>
